Hey @alicetragedy! Just dug into it, and I think these are already validated. They were added to the required fields for students here, which are then validated and tested by the ApplicationDrafts here and here, respectively.

I think that's therefore already resolved!

body:
Hey @alicetragedy! Just dug into it, and I think these are already validated. They were added to the required fields for students [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/application-process-2016/app/models/student.rb#L8), which are then validated and tested by the `ApplicationDraft`s [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/application-process-2016/app/models/application_draft.rb#L7) and [here](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/application-process-2016/spec/models/application_draft_spec.rb#L127), respectively.

I think that's therefore already resolved!
